project.description: This is a PHP project completed by Elkeno Jones during my time at Holland College. It demonstrates the usage of PHP object oriented programming. It also demonstrates using PHP to read and write files on the server.

This is a combination of PHP, XML and XSLT. This project demonstrates using PHP to read from an arbitrary XML document. It also demonstrates using XSLT to properly display the XML files. There are two XML documents that are used to show this.
This example demonstrates simple database usage to create and manage users and comments.
